bookSourceComment: 增加自动验证，不行就手动登录，登录url要与源url一致。 解决目前新的字体格式文字显示的问题(例替换显示为'的')。 by812@221012 解决目前所见到的所有问题，包括页面解析、分页有的页面获取不到、图片转文字等问题，并对内容中出现的翻页断行、以前流行的35字换行排版、部分内容显示HTML源码、推广文字、广告等进行了恢复与过滤。 效果自认为是不错的，就是慢，巨慢，分页多的章节可能获取文字就要几分钟，毕竟，要做过滤和处理。 凑合用吧兄弟们，后续暂时不准备修改了。 地址发布页(浏览器打开) https://zozozo.xyz/ http://www.diyibanzhu666.xyz 目前可用地址： https://www.1yydstxt234.com https://www.2yydstxt234.com/ https://www.3yydstxt426.com/ https://www.7yydstxt226.com/ https://www.7yydstxt434.com/ https://www.8yydstxt234.com/ https://6yydstxt178.com/ 获取最新可用网址 大家可以根据自己的网络情况选一个最快的来用 替换👉源域名👈链接即可 注意版主一系各站点数据库并非完全同步，所以换了地址之后原有的小说如果追更就需要重新搜索。 建议用复制出来源换个名称再批量改源的方式来做。

header:
<js>
(() => {
	try {
		data = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())
	} catch (err) {
		data = {}
	}
	sessionID = data.sessionID||"";
	if (!sessionID) {
		chars = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz123456789";
		charsLength = chars.length
		for (i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
			sessionID += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * charsLength))
		}
		data.sessionID = sessionID
		source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(data))
	}
	return JSON.stringify({
		"cookie": "PHPSESSID=" + sessionID,
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 13_3_1 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/13.0.5 Mobile/15E148 Snapchat/10.77.5.59 (like Safari/604.1)"
	})
})()
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
//状态
novelState = [
	{	title: '全部', type: 0},
	{	title: '连载', type: 1},
	{	title: '完结', type: 2}
]
//分类
novelSort = [
	{	title: '　全部　', type: 0},
	{	title: '玄幻奇幻', type: 1},
	{	title: '仙侠武侠', type: 2},
	{	title: '都市言情', type: 3},
	{	title: '穿越历史', type: 4},
	{	title: '科幻灵异', type: 5},
	{	title: '  藏经阁  ', type: 6},
	{	title: '其他类别', type: 7}
]
//排序
novelRank = [
	{ title: '  更新  ', type: 'lastupdate'},
	{ title: '总人气', type: 'allvisit'},
	{ title: '月人气', type: 'monthvisit'},
	{ title: '  字数  ', type: 'size'},
	{ title: '  新书  ', type: 'postdate'}
]

list = [];
formatUrl = (sort, rank, state) => {
	return `{{eval(String(source.loginUrl));_getUrl();}}shuku/${sort}-${rank}-${state}-{{page}}.html`;
}
pushItem = (title, url, basis) => {
	list.push({
		title: title,
		url: url,
		style: {
			layout_flexGrow: 1,
			layout_flexBasisPercent: basis
		}
	});
}

for (stateItem of novelState) {
	pushItem(`🚫小说状态---${stateItem.title}🚫`, "", 1);
	for (rankItem of novelRank) {
		novelSort[0].title = "📫" + rankItem.title;
		for (sortItem of novelSort) {
			pushItem(`${sortItem.title}`, formatUrl(sortItem.type, rankItem.type, stateItem.type), sortItem.type > 5 ? 0.45 : 0.25);
		}
	}
}
JSON.stringify(list);
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('.bookinfo_intro').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
<js>

try{last=JSON.parse(java.ajax('https://android.jjwxc.net/androidapi/chapterList?novelId='+baseUrl.match(/(\d+)/)[1])).chapterlist;
$=last[last.length-1];
vip=$.isvip?'💰':'';
chapterid=$.chapterid;
chaptername=$.chaptername;
date=$.chapterdate;
vip+chapterid+'、'+chaptername+' '+date}
catch(err){
java.log(err)
result="请刷新"
}
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: $.novelName@put:{id:$.novelId,ns:$.novelStep,nw:'$.novelSize##\\D'}

ruleContent.content:
var javaImport = new JavaImporter(); javaImport.importPackage( Packages.java.lang, Packages.javax.crypto.spec, Packages.javax.crypto, Packages.java.util ); with(javaImport){ let IV_PARAMETER = String("1ae2c94b"); let ALGORITHM = "DES"; let CIPHER_ALGORITHM = "DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding"; let CHARSET = "utf-8"; let password=String("KK!%G3JdCHJxpAF3%Vg9pN"); function decode(data){ let dks = new DESKeySpec(String(password).getBytes()); let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES"); let secretKey = keyFactory.generateSecret(dks); let cipher = Cipher.getInstance(CIPHER_ALGORITHM); let iv = new IvParameterSpec(IV_PARAMETER.getBytes(CHARSET)); cipher.init(Cipher.DECRYPT_MODE, secretKey, iv); return new String(cipher.doFinal(Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(data).getBytes(CHARSET))), CHARSET); } } //DES解密结束 intro=java.get("intro"); intro=intro!=""?"◎"+intro+"◎
":""; content=java.getElement("$.content"); saybody=java.getString("$.sayBody"); say=saybody!=""?"\n◎作者有话要说：\n"+saybody:""; if(baseUrl.match(/token/)){ result=intro+String(decode(content)+say); }else{result=intro+content+say} //获取评论开启 if(!baseUrl.match(/baidu/)){ //匹配书籍id跟章节id bid=baseUrl.match(/novelId=(\d+)/)[1]; cid=baseUrl.match(/chapterId=(\d+)/)[1]; //拼接评论url url="https://s8-static.jjwxc.net/comment_json.php?novelid="+bid+"&chapterid="+cid; //获取评论列表 list=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).body; comment=""; //判断评论数量 len=list.length>15?15:list.length; for(i=0;i

##【普通用户、初级.*用户所发评论将在审核通过后显示！】|【为营造更好的评论环境，近期网站要求发评须进行实名认证，未实名用户评论暂时仅在对应作者后台及发评用户后台可见.*

ruleToc.chapterName:
<js>
$=result;
title=$.chaptername;
title=String(title).replace(/^\s+/,'');
intro=$.chapterintro;
java.put("intro",intro);
vip=$.isvip!='0';

exploreUrl:
<js>
sort=[];
	push=(title,url,type,fp)=>sort.push({
		title: title,
		url: url,
		style: {
				layout_flexGrow: fp,
				layout_flexBasisPercent: type
			}
	});
	u="https://apiv2hans.aixdzs.com/sort"
	xx=(a,b)=>{
		return `list,{"method": "POST","body":'{"bookTypeId":"${a}","type": "${b}","pageNum": "{{page}}"}'}`;
	}
	fls = JSON.parse(java.post(u,'',{}).body());
	push("最新",'',1,1)
	for(f of fls.data.allType){
		push(f.categoryName,u+xx(f.bookTypeId,1),0.25,0.25);
	}
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("大热",'',1,1)
	for(l of fls.data.allType){
		push(l.categoryName,u+xx(l.bookTypeId,2),0.25,0.25);
	}
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	//完本:3
	JSON.stringify(sort);
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
s="2c6689f91ee4d4e87d798397d47310ebbe1dad79ixdzs";
for (i = 0, h = ""; i < 8; i++) {
	x="abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789";
	r = parseInt(Math.random() * (36 - 0 +1) + 0, 10);
	h += x.charAt(r);
}
a=String(Math.round(new Date()));
sha = s + h + a + h;
sha1 = java.digestHex(sha,'SHA-1');

b = baseUrl.match(/"chapterId":(\d+),"bookId":"(\d+)"/)
u=source.getKey();
url = u + "/chapter/content,";
post=`{
  "method": "POST",
  "body":'{"chapterId": ${b[1]},"bookId":"${b[2]}"}',
  "headers":{"checkSumDTO":'{"appid":"ixdzs","checksum":"${sha1}","curtime":"${a}","nonce":"${h}"}'}
}`

result = java.ajax(url+post);
</js>$.data.chapter.chapterContent

ruleContent.content:
<js>
function parseComments(n){
  for(var c=[],e=0;e<n.length;e++){
    var o=n[e]; c.push("".concat(o.createrId.userName,"｜").concat(o.createdAt.slice(0,10),"\n评分：").concat("🌟".repeat(o.score),"\n评语：").concat(o.content.replace(/([\u4e00-\u9fa5])(?=\n|$)/,"$1……").replace(/([^。！？—…]{9}[。；！？—…]+”?)([\u4e00-\u9fa5][^。！？—…]{7})/g,"$1\n$2")))}
return c.join("\n————\n");}
var data = JSON.parse(result);
data=data.data.comments;
data.length == 0 ? '暂无评价！': parseComments(data);
</js>

ruleSearch.author: author##<[^<>]+>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var data = JSON.parse(result).data;
var pageSize = data.comments.length;
var pageCount = Math.ceil(data.total/pageSize) || 1; // NaN
if(pageCount>1){pageCount=2};
var list = Array.from(Array(pageCount).keys());
for(var i = 0; i <pageCount; i++){
  var index = list[i]+1;
  list[i] = {title:'第00' + index +'页', url: baseUrl.split('?')[0] + '?type=latest&page=' + index + '&t='+Date.now()};
}
list;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: @get:{a}
ruleBookInfo.init:
@put:{n:"[property$=book_name]@content",
a:"[property$=author]@content",
k:"[property~=category|status|time]@content",
l:"[property$=chapter_name]@content",
i:"[property$=description]@content",
c:"[property$=image]@content",
t:"text.完整章节目录"}
ruleBookInfo.name: @get:{n}

<js>
m=java.getElements('#searchmain@class.searchTopic');
n=java.getElements('#searchmain@class.searchInfo');
list = [];
for(i in m){
	con = {};
	con.n= String(m[i].select('.searchtitle').text())
	.replace(/《|》|txt.*/g,'')
	con.k = n[i].select('a').get(0).text();
	con.l = n[i].select('.oldDate').text();
	con.w = String(n[i].ownText()).replace(/.*大小：|日期.*/g,'');
	con.b = n[i].select('a').get(1).attr('href');
	list.push(con);
	}
list
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
n=result.match(/第1页 \/ 共(\d+) 页/)[1];
var list=[];
var n = parseInt(n);
ul=java.getString('ul a.0@href');
ui=baseUrl.match(/(.*\/\/[^\/]+)\//)[1];

for(var i=1;i<=n;i++)
{
	url=ui+String(ul).replace(/page=1/,"page="+i);
	me='第'+i+'页';
	list.push({"text":me,"href":url});
}

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

<js>
// 验证码处理 v2 by 酷安@靈狐
// 使用腾讯OCR请设置tx_cookie
// 腾讯OCR有次数限制
// 登录地址https://cloud.tencent.com/login?s_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcloud.tencent.com%2Fproduct%2Focr
// 如果获取不到相关cookie就上传图片识别

// 代码最佳运行环境是在书籍列表页
// 移植其他地方可能会出现bug
// 如果搜索会跳转详情页请完善书籍URL正则
// 滑到最下面传入参数需要更改

var ocr=true // 是否启用ocr，关闭后手动输入，对于手动输入请开启CookieJar或在请求头手动设置一个cookie（部分网站不适用）
var mode=0
/*
0:"百度_通用"
1:"百度_高精度
2:"百度_网络图片"
3:"腾讯_通用"
4:"腾讯_高精度"
5:"腾讯_手写"
6:"腾讯_英语"
*/
var save=false // 是否缓存验证码供多次使用

var toast_level=2
/*
	0:关闭toast弹窗
	1:显示错误消息
	2:显示全部
*/

var tx_cookie={
	'uin':'',
	'skey':'',
}
var header=source.header||''
header=JSON.parse(header!=''?header:'{}')
function concat(o,split){
	let result=''
	for(i in o){
		let v=o[i]
		v=v&&'='+java.encodeURI(v)||''
		result+=result==''&&i+v||split+i+v
	}
	return result
}
tx_cookie=String(concat(tx_cookie,';'))
var Ocr={
tencent:function(base64,mode){
	let extra,params,action,data,body,res,json
	extra={
	 "LanguageType":"en",
		//"IsPdf":true,
		"ImageBase64":"data:image/jpeg;base64,"+base64
	}
 params={
		"ToModule":"ocr",
		"Extra":JSON.stringify(extra)
	}
 action=[
  'GeneralBasicOCR',
  'GeneralAccurateOCR',
  'GeneralHandwritingOCR',
  'EnglishOCR'
 ]
 params.ToAction=action[mode||0]
 body=JSON.stringify(params)
 data={
		"Action":"OcrDemo",
		"CloudEnv":"Formal",
		"Region":"ap-guangzhou",
		"Params":JSON.stringify(params)
		}
	body=JSON.stringify(data)
	res=java.post('https://ocr.smartform.cloud.tencent.com/ocr/forward/cloud',body,{cookie:tx_cookie})
		json=JSON.parse(res.body()).Response
		data=json.Data
		let result=''
		if(data){
			json=JSON.parse(data).Response.TextDetections
			for(i in json){
				result+=json[i].DetectedText
			}
		}else{
			this.msg=json.Error.Message
		}
		return result
},
baidu:function(base64,mode){
	let data,body,type,url,res,json
	data={
		image:'data:image/jpeg;base64,'+base64,
		image_url:null,
		type:'https://aip.baidubce.com/rest/2.0/ocr/v1/',
		detect_direction:false,
		language_type:'ENG'
		}
		type=[
		 'general_basic',
		 'accurate_basic',
		 'webimage'
		]
		data.type=data.type+type[mode||0]
		body=concat(data,'&')
		let result=''
		url='https://ai.baidu.com/aidemo'
		res=java.post(url,body,{'referer':url})
		json=JSON.parse(res.body())
		if(json.errno==0){
		 json=json.data.words_result
		 for(i in json){
			 result+=json[i].words
		 }
		}else{
			this.msg=json.msg
		}
		return result
},
get:function(base64){
	let result
 if(mode<3){
 	 result=this.baidu(base64,mode)
 	}else{
 		result=this.tencent(base64,mode-3)
 	}
 	if(this.msg){
 		java.log(this.msg)
 		if(toast_level>0){
 			java.toast(this.msg)
 		}
 		this.msg=null
 	}
 return result
 }
}
function imgToBase64(imgUrl){
	let res=org.jsoup.Jsoup.connect(imgUrl).ignoreContentType(true).ignoreHttpErrors(true).execute()
	header['cookie']=String(concat(res.cookies(),';'))
	let base64=Packages.cn.hutool.core.codec.Base64.encode(res.bodyAsBytes())
	return base64
}
function Url(u){
	if(!u.match('^http')){
		u = source.key+'/'+u
	}
	u = u.match(/(https?:\/\/)(.+)/)
	u = u[1]+u[2].replace(/\/+/,'/')
	return u
}
function auto(o){
	let base64,yzm,msg,body,res
	if(save&&try_times==0){
		yzm=cache.get(Url('yzm'))
		let temp=cache.get(Url('cookie'))
		if(temp){
		 header.cookie=temp
		}
	}
	if(!yzm){
	 if(ocr){
	  base64=imgToBase64(Url(o.img))
	  yzm=Ocr.get(base64).replace(/[^\w]/g,'')
	  if(yzm!==''){
	   msg='识别验证码：'+yzm
	   java.log(msg)
	   if(toast_level>1){
	    java.toast(msg)
	   }
	  }
	 }else{
		 yzm=java.getVerificationCode(Url(o.img))
		 let t=cookie.getCookie(source.key)
		 if(t&&t!=''){
		 	 header.cookie=t
		 	}
	 }
	}
	cache.delete(Url('yzm'))
	cache.delete(Url('cookie'))
	if(save){
		cache.put(Url('yzm'),yzm)
		cache.put(Url('cookie'),header.cookie)
	}
	for(i in o.data){
		if(!o.data||o.data[i]==''){
			o.data[i]=yzm
		}
	}
	body=concat(o.data,'&')
	method=o.method.toLowerCase()
	if(method=='post'){
	 res=java.post(Url(o.action),body,header)
	}else{
		res=java.get(Url(o.action+'/?')+body,header)
	}
	let jump=res.header("Location")
	jump=jump&&Url(jump)
 if(jump){
  	// 主要用在动态获取更新html，不需要可直接
  	// result='验证码'
 	 result=java.ajax(jump)
 	 // 该判断用在搜索列表规则时处理搜索跳转详情页
	 if(jump.match(source.bookUrlPattern)){
		 java.put('src',result)
		 source.bookUrlPattern=''
		 info=source.bookInfoRule.init
		 tocUrl=source.bookInfoRule.tocUrl
		 js="<"+"js>book.setBookUrl('"+jump+"');java.get('src')</"+"js>"
		 source.bookInfoRule.init=js+info
		 if(!tocUrl||tocUrl==''){
		 	 source.bookInfoRule.tocUrl="@js:'"+jump+"'"
		 	}
		 //toc=source.tocRule.chapterList
		 //source.tocRule.chapterList=js+toc
		 result=''
	 }
 }else{
 	 result=res.body()
 	}
	return result
}
max_try=5
try_times=0
while(result.match('验证码')){
 img=java.getString('img@src')
 input=java.getElement('input')
 data={}
 for([i,node] of Object.entries(input)){
		data[node.attr('name')]=node.attr('value')
	}
	u=java.getString('form@action')
 result=auto({
  action:u,
	 method:'post',
	 img:img,
	 data:data
	})
	// 设置解析为新的html
	java.setContent(result)
	/*上面是动态获取例子，以下是手动填入例子
	auto({
		action:"gut.php", // 提交数据地址
		method:'post', // 提交方式
		img:'captcha.php', // 验证码图片
		data:{ // 提交参数键值对
			search:'系统', // 搜索关键字
			captcha:'' // 识别为空的关键字为验证码
	 }
	})
	搜索关键字不从网页获取就用java.put('key',key)和java.get('key')
	已经很简单了，再不会打屁屁
	*/
if(try_times>=max_try){break}
try_times+=1
}
result
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: h2.0@text
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
u='■';nu='□'
m=baseUrl.split('/')
s=[1,{id:m[6],name:m[4],host:m[4],url:baseUrl}]
o=java.getElement('#chapterlist@div[style].0@a')
x=book.getVariable("custom")
for(i in o){
	m=o[i].attr('href').split('/')
	s.push({id:m[4],name:o[i].text(),host:m[2],url:source.key+o[i].attr('href')})
}
if(x!=''){n=Number(x);r=s[n];if(r.id){s[0]=n;java.toast('切换到源"'+r.host+'"');result=java.ajax(r.url);java.setContent(result)}else{java.toast('没有编号为"'+x+'"的源')}}
info=''
for(i=1;i<s.length;i++){
	info+=(s[0]==i?u:nu)+i+'：'+s[i].name+'\n'
}
java.put('info',info)
s=s[s[0]]
java.put('bookid',s.id)
java.put('source',s.host)
toc=result.match(/url\s*=\s*'(.+?)'/)[1]
tocData=java.get(source.key+toc,{referer:String(s.url)}).body()
if(!tocData||tocData==''){
	java.toast('目录被吃掉了！！')
}else{
	tocData=JSON.parse(tocData)
 tocData=tocData.oridata||tocData.data
 tocData=tocData.split('-//-').map(v=>{v=v.split('-/-');return {i:v[0],cid:v[1],title:v[2],vip:v[3]}})
 if(s.host=='uukanshu')tocData.reverse()
 java.put('last',tocData[tocData.length-1].title)
 java.put('toc',toc)
 java.put('tocData',JSON.stringify(tocData))
}
result
</js>.container

[property="og:novel:lastest_chapter_name"]@content&&[property="og:novel:update_time"]@content##\n20(.*)\s.*## · $1
<js>result.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')</js>
<js>
result.replace(/^(\d+)、第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+\s/,'$1 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)(、|. ?)/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)*/,'$1 $2$3')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
.replace(/第0+/,'第')
.replace(/(第\d+章)\s\d+(.*)/,'$1$2')
</js>

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

bookSourceComment:
20231123 整体修复-尐哖
旧域名：https://api.aixdzs.com
exploreUrl:
<js>
sort=[];
	push=(title,url,type,fp)=>sort.push({
		title: title,
		url: url,
		style: {
				layout_flexGrow: fp,
				layout_flexBasisPercent: type
			}
	});
	u="https://apiv2hans.aixdzs.com/sort"
	xx=(a,b)=>{
		return `list,{"method": "POST","body":'{"bookTypeId":"${a}","type": "${b}","pageNum": "{{page}}"}'}`;
	}
	fls = JSON.parse(java.post(u,'',{}).body());
	push("最新",'',1,1)
	for(f of fls.data.allType){
		push(f.categoryName,u+xx(f.bookTypeId,1),0.25,0.25);
	}
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("大热",'',1,1)
	for(l of fls.data.allType){
		push(l.categoryName,u+xx(l.bookTypeId,2),0.25,0.25);
	}
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	//完本:3
	JSON.stringify(sort);
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: $.author
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
$.lastChapter
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3
ruleBookInfo.name: $.title

ruleContent.content:
<js>
s="2c6689f91ee4d4e87d798397d47310ebbe1dad79ixdzs";
for (i = 0, h = ""; i < 8; i++) {
	x="abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789";
	r = parseInt(Math.random() * (36 - 0 +1) + 0, 10);
	h += x.charAt(r);
}
a=String(Math.round(new Date()));
sha = s + h + a + h;
sha1 = java.digestHex(sha,'SHA-1');

b = baseUrl.match(/"chapterId":(\d+),"bookId":"(\d+)"/)
u=source.getKey().match(/([^\#]+)\#/)[1];
url = u + "/chapter/content,";
post=`{
  "method": "POST",
  "body":'{"chapterId": ${b[1]},"bookId":"${b[2]}"}',
  "headers":{"checkSumDTO":'{"appid":"ixdzs","checksum":"${sha1}","curtime":"${a}","nonce":"${h}"}'}
}`

result = java.ajax(url+post);
</js>$.data.chapter.chapterContent
